    <metadata>

          <title>
            <string language="hu">Az emlősök légzőszervei</string>
            <string language="en">Breathing organs of mammals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Atmenorgane der Säugetiere</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Organes de respiration des mammifères</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Órgãos respirando dos mamíferos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Organi di respirazione dei mammiferi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αναπνοή των οργάνων των θηλαστικών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Órganos de respiración de mamíferos</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A légzőszervek felépítése, a tüdő finomszerkezetének rajza</string>
            <string language="en">Build of breathing organs, drawing of lung's fine organization</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">emlősök,  légzés,  léghólyagocska,  hörgő,  </string>
            <string language="en">mammals, breathing, air sac, bronchial tube</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bau der atmenorgane, Zeichnen der feinen 
Organisation des Lungenflügels</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Construction des organes de respiration, dessin de
l'organisation fine du poumon</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Configuração de órgãos respirando, desenhar 
da organização fina do pulmão</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Configurazione degli organi di respirazione, 
dissipare dell'organizzazione fine del polmone</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατασκευή της αναπνοής των οργάνων, σχεδιασμός της 
λεπτής οργάνωσης του πνεύμονα</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura de órganos de respiración, el trazar
de la organización fina del pulmón</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Säugetiere, atmend, Luftbeutel, bronchiales Gefäß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mammifères, respirant, sac d'air, tube bronchique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mamíferos, respirando, sac de ar, tubo bronchial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">mammiferi, respiranti, sac di aria, tubo bronchiale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">θηλαστικά, αναπνοή, σάκος αέρα, βρογχικός σωλήνας</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mamíferos, respirando, saco de aire, tubo bronquial</string>
          </keyword>
